channel.title: CVE Feed for Hathway -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hathway -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-51730|2024-01-17T07:05:23.683Z -- hathway -- skyworth%20router%20cm5100
item.description:
This vulnerability exist in Skyworth Router CM5100, version 4.1.1.24, due to insufficient validation of user supplied input for the DDNS Password parameter at its web interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by supplying specially crafted input to the parameter at the web interface of the vulnerable targeted system.
Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow the attacker to perform stored XSS attacks on the targeted system.

item.title: CVE-2023-51741|2024-01-17T07:44:29.521Z -- hathway -- skyworth%20router%20cm5100
item.description: This vulnerability exist in Skyworth Router CM5100, version 4.1.1.24, due to transmission of authentication credentials in plaintext over the network. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by eavesdropping on the victim’s network traffic to extract username and password from the web interface (Password Reset Page) of the vulnerable targeted system.

item.title: CVE-2023-51740|2024-01-17T07:42:00.584Z -- hathway -- skyworth%20router%20cm5100
item.description: This vulnerability exist in Skyworth Router CM5100, version 4.1.1.24, due to transmission of authentication credentials in plaintext over the network. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by eavesdropping on the victim’s network traffic to extract username and password from the web interface (Login Page) of the vulnerable targeted system.
